vote.title: A resolution authorizing (1) the adoption of a Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP); (2) the coordination of initiatives and partnerships necessary to implement the actions and goals set forth in the CECAP; and (3) the identification and convening of an Environment and Sustainability Advisory Committee comprised of professionals and community members to advise on environment, sustainability, and CECAP implementation and supporting regular reporting on the CECAP - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: A resolution authorizing (1) the adoption of a Comprehensive Environmental & Climate Action Plan (CECAP); (2) the coordination of initiatives and partnerships necessary to implement the actions and goals set forth in the CECAP; and (3) the identification and convening of an Environment and Sustainability Advisory Committee comprised of professionals and community members to advise on environment, sustainability, and CECAP implementation and supporting regular reporting on the CECAP - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
